title: Cesar Lopez y Habana Ensemble - Clasicos de Cuba [FLAC] TQMP
description:
Cesar Lopez y Habana Ensemble - Clasicos de Cuba
2007

Cuban Music Awards Cubadisco 2008
- Best Instrumental album.

Irakere's former sax player with his band live in concert.

Brought to you by TQMP
The Quality Music Project

Recorded live at the Amadeo Roldan Theater in Havana on March 25, 2007,
Cesar Lopez' group Havana Ensemble took center stage with the backing of the
Havana Chamber Orquestra under the direction of Ivan del Prado. Clasicos de
Cuba was conceived from the top down as a CD in which style, respect and
virtuosity balanced to build a convincing artistic image.

Starting with classics of Cuban music, the saxophonist weaves a rosary of
melodic motifs silhouetted against the subtly of a carefully elaborated
harmonic sound without excesses. The soloist and the band play Rosa mustia
by Angel Diaz, Quiereme y veras by Jose Antonio Mendez, Tu no sospechas by
Marta Valdes, Llanto de luna by Julio Gutierrez, En nosotros by Tania
Castellanos, Tu mi desengaÃƒâ€˜Ã‚ï¿½o by Pablo Milanes, La tarde by Sindo Garay,
Noche cubana by Cesar Portillo de la Luz and Scherezada by Piloto and Vera.

The jazz leanings of Cesar -who had a prodigal career with Irakere and
pianist Chucho Valdes and later put together Habana Ensemble- come through
on different parts of the album. However what has distinguished him most is
his unique ways of making his instrument sing with the feeling of good
minstrels.
-- Cubanews

Tracks
01- Rosa mustia
02- Quiereme y veras
03- Tu no sospechas
04- Llanto de luna
05- En nosotros
06- Tu mi desengano
07- La tarde
08- Noche cubana
09- Scherezada

Artwork (300dpi scan), EAC log and CUE sheet included.
